participant_1.name: Ethan
participant_1.personality: Ethan is energetic and competitive, always striving to do his best on the soccer field. He can be a bit rebellious and dislikes traditional learning methods.
participant_1.background: i'm 13 years old. i ride the bus to school. i hate math class. i'm on the soccer team.

participant_2.name: Sophia
participant_2.personality: Sophia is ambitious and fashion-conscious, with a strong sense of style. She faces challenges but remains determined to pursue her dreams.
participant_2.background: i currently work for a watch dealer. i often shop for shoes and watches. my dream car is a rolls royce ghost. my family doesn't support my career choices.
